name: Brownbook.net
tag_list: open, business-directory, search, localsearch, local-search, global, business-search, reviews, local-reviews, business-reviews, us, uk, canada, australia, wiki, comments
overview:
Brownbook.net lists 34 million businesses across 240 countries. Brownbook is the open business directory that anyone can update and where everyone has their say. Brownbook lets anyone add a business, review a business, even update a businessâ€™s details if theyâ€™re wrong or incomplete. It’s free, and you donâ€™t need to be a member to use it.

Businesses can claim their listing, add photos, videos, price lists, opening times etc and add widgets from Skype, MSN, Meebo, Twitter, Wordpress, Blogger, Facebook, Linked-In, Flickr, YouTube, Google Streetview and Booking Bug.
